about_the_game:
THE OFFICIAL SPACE CHEETAH HYPER RUNNER OST!

Soundtrack composed by Oilskin (check out his work on Bandcamp).

This OST contains all 18 tracks featured in the game, arranged into an entrancing playlist that'll leave you elevated, relaxed, and ready to plug back into your space cheetah!

The soundtrack is perfect to have on in the background, or to chill or study to.

Enjoy the sounds of Neo Tokyo, Joburg AI Supercity, the Mars Experimental Zone, Cyberspace Donuts, the far out orbital speedways, and many more!
